Posts.Content: I had a umbical hernia, when I had my Da Vinci surgery on my Prostate. I asked my Doctor about it, and his response was yes I seen it, Repaired it after he removed the prostae right below it!as he chuckled. My question was to him did you repair it before you did surgery first and said no,it wasn't that bad,I never new it was bad till my wife mention to me that he had fix it, I guess lucky me. One less surgery to dodge
Posts.Title: Dad's prostate surgery hernia repaired
